```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

require(png)

analysis.dir <- 'analysis/'
csv.dir <- paste(analysis.dir, 'data/', sep="")
db.wallpapers <- 'wallpapers-on-databrary.csv'

source(paste(analysis.dir, "load.wp.R", sep=""))
```

## Illustrative image exemplars

### P1, 101001

```{r images-from-Databrary-P1}
pp <- load.wp("P1", 1, fn.df=paste(csv.dir, db.wallpapers, sep='/'))
plot.new()
plot.window(xlim=c(0,1), ylim=c(0,1), asp=1) # square aspect ratio
rasterImage(pp, 0, 0, 1, 1)
```
